Smart Toothbrush with App Integration: Develop a toothbrush that can connect to a smartphone app and track the user's brushing habits, such as duration, pressure, and frequency. The app can provide personalized feedback and recommendations for improving oral hygiene.

Toothbrush with UV Sterilization: Incorporate UV sterilization technology into the toothbrush handle to kill bacteria and viruses that can collect on toothbrush bristles. This can help prevent oral infections and reduce the risk of spreading germs to other surfaces.

Toothbrush with Built-in Timer and Pressure Sensor: Create a toothbrush with a built-in timer that reminds the user to brush for the recommended two minutes and a pressure sensor that alerts the user if they are applying too much pressure.

Toothbrush with Interchangeable Brush Heads: Design a toothbrush with interchangeable brush heads that can be replaced when the bristles become worn out. This can help extend the lifespan of the toothbrush and provide a more effective brushing experience.

Toothbrush with Built-in Water Reservoir: Incorporate a built-in water reservoir into the toothbrush handle that can be filled with water or mouthwash. This can help keep the bristles moist and reduce the amount of water needed for brushing.
